homepage_aim: Predict the Market. Track Your Accuracy.
about_mission_text: StockPredictor was founded on the principle that the collective wisdom of informed individuals can be a powerful tool in navigating the financial markets. Our mission is to provide a platform where both novice investors and seasoned professionals can test their analytical skills, learn from the community, and build a transparent track record of their market predictions.
about_how_it_works_predict_text: Make predictions on thousands of assets with various timeframes, from hourly to yearly.
about_how_it_works_compete_text: Climb the leaderboards by making accurate predictions and prove your skills to the community.
about_how_it_works_follow_text: Follow top predictors to learn from their strategies and get notified about their new market moves.
about_how_it_works_golden_text: Become a Golden Member to offer exclusive content to your subscribers and build your brand.
about_how_it_works_track_text: Build a transparent, long-term track record of your performance across all timeframes and assets.
profile_watchlist_empty: This user is not watching any stocks yet.
profile_achievements_empty: No achievements yet. Keep making predictions!
verified_tick_popover_text: This user is a verified member of the community, indicating a commitment to the platform.
verified_modal_text: Gain credibility and visibility in the community with a verified badge.
verified_modal_benefit1: Get a green checkmark next to your name across the site.
verified_modal_benefit2: Your predictions get featured in the "Verified Only" filter on the Explore page.
verified_modal_benefit3: Get recommended as a Verified Expert on relevant Watchlist pages.
verified_status_modal_text: You have increased trust and visibility in the community.
rating_explained_text1: Our platform uses a **Proximity Rating System** to reward accuracy. Instead of a simple "correct" or "incorrect," your rating is based on how close your prediction was to the actual outcome.
rating_explained_text2: For example, if a stock is at $152 and you predict it will be $150, you will receive a much higher rating than someone who predicted $180. This system is designed to reward thoughtful analysis over random guesses. The maximum rating for a perfect prediction is 100, with the rating decreasing the further your prediction is from the final price.
aiwizard_description: Get personalized stock recommendations based on the patterns of our top-performing predictors.
aiwizard_step1_text: Answer a few questions about your investment timeframe and interests.
aiwizard_step2_text: Our system finds top predictors who consistently win in your areas of interest.
aiwizard_step3_text: Receive a curated feed of stocks that our best analysts are watching.
aiwizard_signin_to_join: Sign In to Join the Waitlist
aiwizard_early_access_note: Be the first to know when it launches. Early registrants will get free access for a limited time!
aiwizard_legal_note: **Legal Note:** The AI Portfolio Assist provides insights based on historical user data for informational purposes only. It is not financial advice. All investment decisions should be made with your own research and due diligence.
aiwizard_join_success: You're on the list! We'll notify you on launch.
contact_intro_text: Have a question, feedback, or a partnership inquiry? We'd love to hear from you.
contact_fill_form_text: Fill out the form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_urgent_text: For urgent matters, you can also reach us directly at:
contact_error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

toggle_all_predictions_description: Get a notification for every new prediction made by users you follow.
toggle_short_term_description: Be notified when a followed user makes a significant Hourly, Daily, or Weekly prediction.
toggle_long_term_description: Be notified when a followed user makes a significant Monthly, or longer prediction.

privacy_intro_text: Welcome to StockPredictor ('we', 'us', 'our'). We are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our service. By using StockPredictor, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. This policy is written in compliance with the EU's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
info_collection_a_text:
We collect information you provide directly to us, including: 
 ‚Ä¢ Account Information: When you register using Google, we receive your name, email address, and profile picture as provided by your Google account. When you complete your profile, we also collect your chosen username and any optional information you add, such as your 'About' bio and social media links. 
 ‚Ä¢ Payment Information: To process payments for 'Verified Predictor' status or 'Golden Member' subscriptions, we require your payment information. This is collected and processed directly by our payment processor, Stripe, and is never stored on our servers. We only store a record of your subscription status and customer ID. 
 ‚Ä¢ User Content: We collect the content you create, such as your predictions, rationales, and Golden Feed posts.
info_collection_b_text:
‚Ä¢ Cookies and Session Data: We use cookies solely to maintain your session after you log in. A cookie is a small piece of data stored on your computer. This is essential for the app to know who you are. 
 ‚Ä¢ Usage Data: We may collect data on how you interact with the service, such as pages visited and features used, to help us improve the platform.
use_info_text:
We use the information we collect for the following purposes: 
 ‚Ä¢ To provide and maintain our Service, create your user profile, and display your predictions. 
 ‚Ä¢ To process your payments and manage your Subscriptions ('Verified' and 'Golden Member'). 
 ‚Ä¢ To communicate with you, including sending transactional emails (like payment receipts or password resets) and notifications you have opted into. 
 ‚Ä¢ To analyze usage to improve the Service. 
 ‚Ä¢ To enforce our Terms of Service and prevent abuse.
sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. We only share your data with the following third-party service providers (sub-processors) who are essential for us to operate our Service:
sharing_list_a: Payment Processor: We share your email, user ID, and transaction details with Stripe to securely process all payments and manage subscriptions.
sharing_list_b: Authentication Provider: We use Google LLC to handle user login and authentication.
sharing_list_c: Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required to do by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g., a court or government agency).
gdpr_intro: As our service is based in the Netherlands, you have specific data protection rights under the GDPR. We are committed to upholding these rights. You have:
gdpr_list_a: The Right to Access: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
gdpr_list_b: The Right to Rectification: You have the right to correct any inaccurate or incomplete data. You can update most of your profile information directly on your 'Edit Profile' page.
gdpr_list_c: The Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten): You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data. Please note that we may be required to retain certain information for a period for legal or financial record-keeping purposes (e.g., records of payments).
gdpr_list_d: The Right to Data Portability: You have the right to request that we transfer the data we have collected on you to another organization, or directly to you, in a machine-readable format.
gdpr_outro: To exercise any of these rights, please contact our Data Protection Contact at predictostock@gmail.com. We will respond to your request within 30 days.
retention_text: We will retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will keep your account data as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, we will take steps to delete your personal data within a reasonable timeframe, except for data we are legally obligated to retain (such as payment records for tax and accounting purposes).
cookies_text: We use essential cookies to maintain your session after you log in. A cookie is a small piece of data stored on your computer. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies, but if you do, you will not be able to log in or use our Service.
children_text: Our Service is not intended for use by anyone under the age of 16 (in compliance with GDPR). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 16. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.
security_text: The security of your data is important to us. We use security measures like session encryption (HTTPS) and secure password storage (via Google) to protect your information. However, remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee its absolute security.
updates_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
contact_text: If you have any questions or requests concerning this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact our Data Protection Contact at: predictostock@gmail.com

acceptance_of_terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance_of_terms.content: By accessing or using the StockPredictor website ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.

no_financial_advice.title: 2. No Financial Advice
no_financial_advice.content: The information, predictions, and scores provided on this Service are for informational and entertainment purposes only. Nothing on this website constitutes financial, investment, legal, or tax advice. You are solely responsible for your own investment decisions.

user_conduct.title: 3. User Conduct
user_conduct.content: You agree not to use the Service to post or transmit any material which is malicious, defamatory, or otherwise violates any law. You are responsible for all predictions and content posted under your account.

limitation_of_liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: In no event shall StockPredictor, nor its directors or employees, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of the Service.

golden_members.title: 5. Golden Member Subscriptions and Platform Fees
golden_members.content: StockPredictor provides a platform for certain users ('Golden Members') to offer subscription-based content. By activating your Golden Member status, you agree to offer these services to other users. To cover platform operation, payment processing, and administrative costs, StockPredictor will retain a thirty percent (30%) platform fee (the 'Platform Fee') from the gross subscription revenue generated from your subscribers. The remaining seventy percent (70%) will be paid out to you via our payment processor, Stripe. This 30% fee is automatically deducted from each transaction. By becoming a Golden Member, you acknowledge and agree to this 30% Platform Fee structure.

analyst_rating.title: 6. Analyst Rating System
analyst_rating.content: The Service features an 'Analyst Rating' system to reward high-quality contributions. Users may earn ratings for various activities, including, but not limited to: achieving high scores on predictions (e.g., >70% accuracy), earning platform badges, achieving high leaderboard ranks, and sharing platform content. The specific activities and rating amounts are determined by StockPredictor and may be changed at any time. This rating is a promotional feature and has no direct cash value.

creator_pool.title: 7. Creator Pool Payouts
creator_pool.content: As a reward to our top contributors, StockPredictor allocates fifty percent (50%) of its quarterly net profit (revenue minus all operating expenses, taxes, and fees) to a 'Creator Pool.' This pool is distributed to users based on their 'Analyst Rating' as a percentage of the total Analyst Rating on the platform. Payouts are calculated quarterly and distributed on a Net-30 basis (30 days after the quarter ends). To be eligible for a payout, a user must have a minimum accumulated payout balance of $100.00 USD. Balances below this minimum will roll over to the next quarter. All users are responsible for their own tax liabilities resulting from any payouts. StockPredictor reserves the right to modify, pause, or terminate the Creator Pool program at any time, with or without notice.

payments_and_refunds.title: 8. Payments, Subscriptions, and Refunds
payments_and_refunds.content: Our platform offers paid services, including the 'Verified Predictor' status and 'Golden Member' subscriptions (collectively, 'Subscriptions'). All payments are processed through our third-party payment processor, Stripe. We do not store or retain your credit card information. All Subscriptions are billed on a recurring monthly basis. You may cancel your Subscription at any time through your user profile or our payment processor's portal. Your cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle, and you will retain access to the paid features until that date. All payments for Subscriptions are final and non-refundable. We do not provide refunds or credits for any partial subscription periods or unused content.

content_and_ip.title: 9. User Content and Intellectual Property Rights
content_and_ip.content: You retain all ownership rights to the content you create on the Service, including your profile information, prediction rationales, and Golden Feed posts ('User Content'). By posting User Content, you grant StockPredictor a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual license to use, host, display, reproduce, and distribute your User Content solely for the purpose of operating, promoting, and improving the Service. You warrant that you own your User Content or have all necessary rights to post it and grant us this license, and that your content does not infringe on the rights of any third party. If you believe your copyright has been infringed upon, please contact us immediately at predictostock@gmail.com with a DMCA Takedown Notice.

termination.title: 10. Account Termination
termination.content: StockPredictor reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account and access to the Service at our sole discretion, with or without notice, for any reason, including for violation of these Terms. You may also terminate your account at any time by contacting us or using an in-app deletion feature, if available. Upon termination by either party, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. All pre-paid fees for Subscriptions are non-refundable, and you will not be eligible for a refund for any portion of your subscription term remaining at the time of termination. We reserve the right to delete your User Content upon termination, but are not obligated to do so.

disputes.title: 11. Dispute Resolution and Governing Law
disputes.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands, without regard to its conflict of law principles. You agree to resolve any dispute you have with StockPredictor exclusively through binding arbitration in Den Haag, the Netherlands, and not in a court of law. You and StockPredictor agree to waive any right to participate in a class-action lawsuit or class-wide arbitration. All disputes must be brought in your individual capacity, and not as a plaintiff or class member in any purported class or representative proceeding.

infoModal.title: Time Bonus Explained
infoModal.description: To reward early analysis, a time-based penalty is applied to predictions. The maximum score you can achieve from a prediction decreases as the deadline approaches.

hourlyPredictions.title: Hourly Predictions:
hourlyPredictions.description: The penalty is applied minute-by-minute. The first 10 minutes have no penalty (Max Rating: 100). The penalty increases linearly until the last 10 minutes of the hour, where the Max Rating is 80.

dailyPredictions.title: Daily Predictions:
dailyPredictions.description: The penalty is applied throughout the trading day. Predictions made right at market open have the highest potential rating.

longerTermPredictions.title: Longer-Term Predictions:
longerTermPredictions.description: For Weekly, Monthly, and longer predictions, the penalty is proportional to the percentage of the prediction period that has already passed.

predictionTypes.hourlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current or next trading hour. Ideal for short-term volatility.
predictionTypes.dailyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current or next trading day. A classic timeframe for day-to-day market moves.
predictionTypes.weeklyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current trading week (Friday). Good for tracking weekly trends.
predictionTypes.monthlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current calendar month. Best for capturing monthly momentum.
predictionTypes.quarterlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current financial quarter (e.g., March, June, September, December).
predictionTypes.yearlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current calendar year. A long-term prediction for major market shifts.

aggressiveness.title: Prediction Style
aggressiveness.noData: No recent predictions with sufficient data.

aggressivenessInfoModal.title: Understanding Prediction Style
aggressivenessInfoModal.description: This meter analyzes the risk level of a user's predictions. The thresholds for each style change based on the prediction's timeframe.
aggressivenessInfoModal.defensiveText: Cautious predictions with small price targets, focusing on consistency (e.g., <3% for Daily, <15% for Yearly).
aggressivenessInfoModal.neutralText: Moderately ambitious predictions that balance risk with potential reward.
aggressivenessInfoModal.offensiveText: Bold, high-risk predictions with large price targets (e.g., >7% for Daily, >35% for Yearly).

market_maven.name: Market Maven
market_maven.description: Awarded for high overall prediction accuracy across all types.

daily_oracle.name: Daily Oracle
daily_oracle.description: Excelled at predicting the market's daily movements.

monthly_maven.name: Monthly Maven
monthly_maven.description: Proven ability to forecast market trends over a month.

yearly_legend.name: Yearly Legend
yearly_legend.description: Exceptional skill in forecasting year-long market outcomes.

analystRatingInfo.title: Analyst Rating Explained
analystRatingInfo.description: Your 'Analyst Rating' is a measure of your valuable contributions to the platform. This rating determines your share of the Creator Pool.
analystRatingInfo.section1.title: 1. High-Quality Predictions (+2 to +10 Rating)
analystRatingInfo.section1.text: You earn Analyst Rating points for every prediction that is assessed with high accuracy (Rating > 70). The higher your score, the more points you earn. This rewards quality over quantity.
analystRatingInfo.section2.title: 2. Earning Badges (+100 to +500 Rating)
analystRatingInfo.section2.text: When you earn a new badge (e.g., 'Weekly Strategist'), you receive a large, one-time rating bonus. Gold badges provide a larger bonus than Silver or Bronze.
analystRatingInfo.section3.title: 3. Sharing Content (+5 Rating)
analystRatingInfo.section3.text: You receive a small rating bonus when you share your ranks or badges. This is rate-limited to prevent spam.
analystRatingInfo.section4.title: 4. Leaderboard Ranks
analystRatingInfo.section4.text: You earn large, periodic bonuses for placing in the Top 100 on any leaderboard. Points are weighted by competition: a Top 10 rank on a popular stock (like $AAPL) is worth more than a Top 10 rank on a quiet one. Hourly/Daily ranks are checked every 15 minutes; longer-term ranks (Weekly, Monthly) are checked on their respective schedules.
analystRatingInfo.section5.title: 5. Referrals
analystRatingInfo.section5.text: You will earn a significant rating bonus for inviting new, active users to the platform.
